document.full_text: derrick rose scored 30 points and the chicago bulls closed in on the top seed in the eastern conference by beating the boston celtics 97-81 on thursday.
document.title: rose leads bulls past celtics 97-81
lines_and_colors: derrick rose scored 30 points and the chicago bulls closed in on the top seed in the eastern conference by beating the boston celtics 97-81 on thursday.
